text: AWS allows us the redundancy the scaling
the support that we need to to help
those most in need to those in poverty
those with less access to services those
most vulnerable those escaping conflict
and natural disasters people in need has
a really progressive approach to the
work they do there's a strong technology
focus within the projects that we work
on for example the early warning system
were using Cambodia people in need first
arrived hosts 2007 floods in the country
Cambodia is considered one of the more
vulnerable countries in the Asian region
to the effects of things like flooding
and having obviously the monsoon season
every year and so there were were some
of the most significant floods in the
country as a consequence of that we saw
the need for disaster preparedness and
an early early warning system to be put
in place by 2013 we tried our first
pilot trial of the early warning system
which was a mobile phone based system
mis-sent
voice messages to people in disaster
affected areas didn't prepare them for
flooding and storms and other natural
disasters we now have over a hundred
thousand registered households in the
system covering 25 provinces of Cambodia
essentially the whole country the great
thing about AWS which we've been using
for the last few years is the ability to
scale and send tens of thousands of
calls per minute we have seen
particularly the need to develop a
web-based platform to handle all the
information that we process in assisting
the people that we do AWS allows us to
use features like elastic Beanstalk for
auto scaling to cope with the load of
our system elastic search and Cabana for
visualizations of our platform lambda
phys scripting to automate some of their
processes and we're also looking at
using some of the IOT services in the
near future because obviously we're
using a lot more devices connecting into
our network we now have the system in
place which is browser-based web
application which works online and
offline is accessible too in all these
locations around the world and provides
an easy to use and intuitive simple
platform I'm excited about the potential
for using some of the newer technologies
available in AWS like machine learning
and
catbots in our work
